title: Herbal Remedies and Alternative Medicine
description: Students are introduced to complementary medicine in this course. Alternative therapies are discussed and evaluated using evidence-based research. Particular attention is given to herbal remedies and the safety and efficacy of the common herbs used in North America.
cleaned_text: Course Code NUTR 263 Academic Year 2016-2017 Students are introduced to complementary medicine in this course. Alternative therapies are discussed and evaluated using evidence-based research. Particular attention is given to herbal remedies and the safety and efficacy of the common herbs used in North America.
